Sample Alert at Hospital Entrance
Sample Alert at Hospital Entrance

If you have fever and/or respiratory symptoms…… Cover your nose and mouth with a mask Report your symptoms to the receptionist
If you have fever and/or
respiratory symptoms……
Cover your nose and
mouth with a mask
Report your symptoms to
the receptionist

Strategies for Patient Placement
Strategies for Patient Placement

• Use private rooms where available • Designate wards for SARS patients where increased capacity is needed – Segregate suspect SARS cases from patients being evaluated for SARS until diagnosis is established
